publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5431 Brian Adam on behalf of the Standards and Public Appointments Committee: Determinations required under the Interests of Members of the Scottish Parliament Act 2006—That the Parliament notes the Standards and Public Appointments Committee’s 5th Report, 2006 (Session 2), Determinations required under the Interests of Members of the Scottish Parliament Act 2006 - Determination required under Section 4 (SP Paper 706), and agrees that the determination set out in Annexe A to the report be made with effect from 4 April 2007.
